---
title: {{ COOK_TITLE }}
params: 
  inputDir: "../gathered/"
  thisDir:  "../cook/"
  outputDir: "../cooked/"
  thisFileName: {{ COOK_FILE }}
  inputFiles: [file1, file1]
---

```{r KnitrOpts, echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=TRUE, message=TRUE, warning=TRUE, error=TRUE)
```

```{r Load}
load(file = paste0(params$inputDir, params$inputFiles, ".rda"))
```


```{r WriteOutput}
save(file = paste0(params$outputDir, params$thisFileName, ".rda")
     , )
```
